page.title: 16RELIGION
page.content: {CHURCHES AND CHAPELS. Within our survey area there are 6 churches.They are St. Elvan, St. Margaret,St. Mary Magdalene,St. Matthew and St. John.There is one Roman Catholic church called St. Joseph's.There are numerous chapels: Baptist (5),Methodist (3),Presbyterian (4),Congregationalist (4) as well as many other denominations. A school survey showed less than 5% of the pupils attended regularly at any place of worship.However, every school is required by law to conduct a religious service every day (i.e. a Christian service). This usually contains a moral story, a prayer, and a hymn followed by any school notices. Most children find assembly boring and irrelevant.
